snippet.title: Vampire Hunters - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Vampire Hunters will be available for PC via Steam and Microsoft Store, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on October 30, 2024.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2206270/Vampire_Hunters/

Vampire Hunters has players stack weapons until you end up with absurd, impossibly awesome builds. Test your firepower, die, then try again with survivors-like elements, insane-yet-useful upgrades, and addicting “just one more try” gameplay. Relentless action, blood-pumping music, and a darkly steampunk world combine to deliver a gun-crazy, fantastical Roguelite FPS experience unlike anything else you have seen before.

- Stack up to 14 weapons to amass earth-shattering firepower.
- Collect every firearm – from the classic revolver to a high-pressure holy water hose.
- Upgrade, upgrade, upgrade!
- Slay vampires, demons, and everything undead by the thousands.
- Enjoy this novel mix of old-school FPS with the unique gameplay from Vampire Survivors.
